    • What are mobility trends like in the US?

    What are mobility trends like in the US?

    plot_us_mobility.Rmd

    Let’s load the data, and filter down to the United States of America.

    library(covid19mobility)
library(dplyr)

us_mobile <- refresh_covid19mobility_country() %>%
  filter(location_code == "USA")

    Now, let’s plot it!

    library(ggplot2)


ggplot(us_mobile,
       aes(x = date, y = value, color = data_type)) +
  geom_line(size = 1.1) +
  theme_bw(base_size=12)

    Developed by Jarrett Byrnes.
